title: Amir Khan furious with wife for ‘losing £2m’ in prank
text:
Amir Khan was desperate to get his millions back in the bank (Picture: YouTube/Faryal Makhdoom)

Amir Khan lost his cool when his wife, Faryal Makhdoom, pulled the mother of all pranks by making him think he had lost £2 million. But in the midst of his anger, he suggested it was because she was a ‘woman’.

The former I’m A Celebrity star was set-up by his wife into thinking she had accidentally transferred an eye-watering £2 million into the account of his friend Sam who, unbeknownst to Amir, was also in on the prank.

Faryal, 28, had hidden cameras around their kitchen to catch the moment Amir was fooled into thinking £2 million of his tax-free money was gone forever.

Growing increasingly furious with his wife, Amir shouted: ‘From £20 you were supposed to put in, to £2million?

‘What the f*** do you do all day?’

At one point, he then remarked to Sam on the phone when explaining what happened: ‘Bro, this is what I mean, women,’ suggesting that Faryal made the mistake simply because of her gender.

The reality of the (fake) situation then dawned on Amir, 32, who admitted that legally Sam wouldn’t be obligated to return the money.

‘How do we get him to send it back?’ he wondered desperately. ‘Legally, that’s it. We can’t chase him back for that money.

‘From £20 to £2million you dumb f**k. What is wrong with you Faryal? What the f***’s wrong with your head?’

Amir was unaware there were secret cameras all over the house (Picture: YouTube, Faryal Makhdoom)

Amir and Faryal are expecting their third child (Picture: WENN.com)

Faryal eventually put the boxer out of his misery by confessing the whole thing was a prank and asked her flustered husband: ‘There’s a camera there, there’s a camera there… Do you really think I’d give away £2m!’

After taking some time to cool down, Amir shared a link to the YouTube video on his Instagram account and said: ‘I’m usually a very calm person. But @faryalmakhdoom got me BAD this time!! Check out the full video on her YouTube channel.

‘What would your reaction be if 2 million went missing!!!?’

Faryal certainly wouldn’t need the stress of losing £2 million either as she’s currently pregnant with their third child.
